ProjectTitle: Towards an Education of the Senses (EoS): An alternative pragmatic view on STEAM
InitialFeedbackHistory:
08/04/2024
Ethics and personal data: in the data table you indicate observations in schools, focus groups and interviews; by doing this you have to process personal data, please include this in your ethics application and update this upon approval in your DMP which you can submit as intermediate

03/04/2024
BOF requests a Data Management Plan following the Flemish standard DMP template; this template contains additional questions about the data that you will reuse/generate, documentation, data preservation, sharing and responsibilities. You can find this template in www.dmponline.be where you also find guidance for each question, or you can use the word template that FWO provides, see https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/guidance/dmp/dmp.
label: intermediate DMP needed
